page.title: 16THE MEDIA (CONTINUED)
page.content:
LOCAL AND NATIONAL NEWSPAPERS, MAGAZINES ETC. ARE FOR SALE AT THE DAIRY,AND REGULAR ORDERS ARE DELIVERED WITH THE MILK.THERE ARE NUMEROUS FREE ISSUE LOCAL PAPERS DELIVERED TO HOMES BY THE PUBLISHERS.
A MOBILE LIBRARY VISITS THE VILLAGE EVERY MONDAY FOR AN HOUR.THERE IS NO LIMIT TO THE NUMBER OF BOOKS BORROWED, OR THE PERIOD OF BORROWING.THE MOBILE SCHOOL LIBRARY VISITS THE SCHOOL ANNUALLY,AND SUFFICIENT STOCK IS SELECTED FOR THE YEAR.FOR A MORE COMPREHENSIVE STOCK THE NEAREST LIBRARY IS IN AMPTHILL OR FLITWICK 3 & 5 MILES AWAY RESPECTIVELY.
A PARISH MAGAZINE "ST MARY'S & ST MARGARET'S" IS PRODUCED ONCE A MONTH, WRITTEN,TYPED AND EDITED BY LOCAL PEOPLE AND DUPLICATED IN THE VICARAGE.
